Source Notes: Very common reply to “obrigado(a)”. Also “De nada!”.

Source: Pode falar mais devagar, por favor?
Target: Could you speak a little slower, please?
Pronunciation (IPA): /kʊd ju spik ə ˈlɪtəl ˈsloʊɚ, pliz/
Pronunciation (Simplified): /kud yoo speek ə ˈli-təl ˈsloh-er, pleez/

Source: Meu português não é muito bom.

Target: How do you say … in English?
Can we get the check, please?
Can I pay with a card?
